title: Amazon Essentials Men's Cotton Cushioned Performance Work Crew Sock, 4 Pairs
description: COMFORT AND FIT: These crew-height socks fit near the base of the calf, have a smooth toe construction that eliminates bulky seams and reduces pressure points, and zoned mesh to provide ventilation and breathability. Cushioned soles provide protection and underfoot comfort.
MATERIAL: Amazon Essentials socks are made from high-quality and durable materials. These socks are a poly-cotton blend with spandex for superior fit and shape retention.
DESIGN: These performance socks are perfect for work or for anyone who prefers a sock with more cushion.

An Amazon brand- Stock up on this must-have 4 pair pack of performance work crew socks featuring smooth toe seams, reinforced heel and toe, moisture management and mesh ventilation for all day comfort.
